dialogues.DialogueText: Kent, how dare you! Ed didn't do anything wrong! Why are you bugging him?
Try and stop me! With me new pirate crew, and Ed's generator, I'll be unstoppable!
Ooooo, I love pirates! Can I be the captain?
Lemme at ‘em! Let's attack them! Let's surround them!
Excellent idea! If three of us surround one of them, it will be much weaker. Looks like there are some cannons to help us too.
And if we surround Kent's generators, we'll get more energy each turn.
...I still want to be captain of the ship.
Stand next to the wheel and you could pretend you are... I guess.
Yay! Then I can sail it to outer space!
One final thing... use WASD to move the camera, L to switch the view, and scroll to zoom.
Is everybody ready? Let's get to the stern of the ship! Let's stop Kent!
I’ll race you to the back of the ship!
